Entry.JapaneseText: ラドラスの落日に始まる一連の事件は、すべて ユリスの意思によるものだったんだな……
Entry.EnglishText: So all these events that started on the Dusk of Ladras were born out of Yuris's intentions...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下が命を賭けて目覚めさせたフォルス。
Entry.EnglishText: ...The Force that King Ladras awakened by giving up his life...

Entry.JapaneseText: はからずも、それがこの邪悪な存在に 立ち向かう力になるとは……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Would happen to become the power to oppose this evil being...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラドラス王を信じたいと、あんたは言っていた…… それは間違っていなかったのかもしれないな……
Entry.EnglishText: You said that you wanted to believe in King Ladras... I guess your confidence wasn't misplaced...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……この能力は、ラドラス陛下が カレギアに残された希望だった……俺はそう思う。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... These powers were the hope left behind by King Ladras for Callegea... That is what I believe.
